content.name: com.microchip.mcu32.mplabx.project.usb_apps_device_hid_mouse_sam_e70_xult_freertos
content.displayName: HID Mouse Example (hid_mouse) Example for SAM E70/S70/V70/V71 Family
content.shortDescription: This demonstration application creates a USB HID based two-button mouse device. When connected, the device emulates mouse operation by moving the cursor in a circular pattern. When the button in USB device is pressed the movement of cursor is Stopped/Started again .
content.author: Microchip
